thread.title: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meets delegates from the South in Pyongyang

title: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meets delegates from the South in Pyongyang
text:
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meets delegates from the South in Pyongyang 2:56pm GMT - 01:01 
Kim was reported as saying that he has a ''firm will to vigorously advance'' inter-Korean ties and ''write a new history of national reunification''. Rough cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
